§ 153301. Organization National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution (in this chapter, the “corporation”) is a body corporate and politic in the District of Columbia. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1423.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
15330136:20a.June 9, 1906, ch. 3065, §§ 1, 5, 6, 34 Stat. 227, 228. 36:20e.36:20f.
This section is substituted for 36:20a for consistency in the revised title and to eliminate unnecessary and executed words. The text of 36:20e and 20f is omitted as obsolete.
